Body: 1) Do ezpdf reader and repligo reader allow you to browse through your annotations like Skim does? I want to be able to see all my notes and highlights in a list on a side panel or the like, including what page the annotation is on.2) After I annotate the document on my android, which of these apps will let me save them and open the document with the added annotations in Skim, all searchable in a list? Which converts better when opening in Skim?3) More generally, which app for android is most like Skim? Which one is better for annotating pdfs?Thanks.
Title: Ezpdf reader or repligo reader comparison and exporting annotations to Skim

history.Text: 1) Do **ezpdf reader** and **repligo reader** allow you to browse through your annotations like **Skim** does? I want to be able to see all my notes and highlights in a list on a side panel or the like, including what page the annotation is on.2) After I annotate the document on my android, which of these apps will let me save them and open the document with the added annotations in **Skim**, all searchable in a list? Which converts better when opening in Skim?3) More generally, which app for android is most like **Skim**? Which one is better for annotating pdfs?Thanks.
Ezpdf reader or repligo reader comparison and exporting annotations to Skim
